description: This file is a shell script responsible for managing the download, extraction, validation, and setup of application packages in an embedded or device management environment. It includes logic for downloading packages, extracting tar and ipk files, signature validation with OpenSSL, mounting temporary filesystems based on package size, and post-processing steps depending on package type.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Prints usage instructions for the script.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Removes temporary PID file for process cleanup on script exit.

methods.name: updatePkgStatus
methods.description: Updates the package installation status and broadcasts it.
